svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:142.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/142.0" version="28.2.1"> <diagram id="qSphjzBOJ25iz32ZgMjr" name="Page-1"> <mxGraphModel dx="2416" dy="853" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="850" pageHeight="1100" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-0" /> <mxCell id="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-0" /> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-0" value="Layer da API" style="shape=umlFrame;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;pointerEvents=0;width=70;height=40;" vertex="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1"> <mxGeometry x="-820" y="170" width="470" height="260" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-1" value="<h1 style="margin-top: 0px;">Techtonic CMS</h1><p>Um diagrama que demonstra, de forma didática, como este serviço headless de CMS funciona.</p>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1"> <mxGeometry x="-840" y="10" width="180" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-2" value="API" style="html=1;dashed=0;whiteSpace=wrap;" vertex="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1"> <mxGeometry x="-515" y="300" width="100" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-3" value="Asset store" style="shape=cylinder;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;backgroundOutline=1;" vertex="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1"> <mxGeometry x="-260" y="190" width="60" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-4" value="Postgres Database" style="shape=cylinder;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;backgroundOutline=1;" vertex="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1"> <mxGeometry x="-260" y="310" width="60" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-5" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.7;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.25;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1" source="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-2" target="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-3"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-190" y="380" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-140" y="330" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-6" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.75;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.3;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1" source="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-2" target="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-4"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-190" y="380" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-140" y="330" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-7" value="A API se conecta ao banco de dados e ao gerenciador de arquivos/assets." style="shape=note;size=20;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1"> <mxGeometry x="-310" y="20" width="130" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-8" value="A api e a camada de comunicação com o client. Esta comunicação e feita por GraphQL, e rest para a transferencia de arquivos" style="shape=note;size=20;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1"> <mxGeometry x="-685" y="440" width="160" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-9" value="Data Layer" style="shape=umlFrame;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;pointerEvents=0;width=80;height=40;" vertex="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1"> <mxGeometry x="-310" y="130" width="280" height="310" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-10" value="Component de auth" style="html=1;dropTarget=0;whiteSpace=wrap;" vertex="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1"> <mxGeometry x="-680" y="220" width="130" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-11" value="" style="shape=module;jettyWidth=8;jettyHeight=4;" vertex="1" parent="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-10"> <mxGeometry x="1" width="20" height="20" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-27" y="7" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-12" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1" source="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-2" target="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-10"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-190" y="380" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-140" y="330" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-13" value="<div align="left">A API tem vários componentes.</div><div align="left"><br></div><div align="left">- Auth: Gerencia usuários e permissões.</div><div align="left">- Assets: Gerencia arquivos multimedia.</div><div align="left">- Conteudo: Gerencia conteudos como coleções definidas por usuarios.&nbsp;</div>" style="shape=note;size=20;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;" vertex="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1"> <mxGeometry x="-815" y="220" width="130" height="180" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-14" value="Componente de conteúdo" style="html=1;dropTarget=0;whiteSpace=wrap;" vertex="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1"> <mxGeometry x="-525" y="187.5" width="120" height="75" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-15" value="" style="shape=module;jettyWidth=8;jettyHeight=4;" vertex="1" parent="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-14"> <mxGeometry x="1" width="20" height="20" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-27" y="7" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-16" value="Component de assets" style="html=1;dropTarget=0;whiteSpace=wrap;" vertex="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1"> <mxGeometry x="-670" y="330" width="120" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-17" value="" style="shape=module;jettyWidth=8;jettyHeight=4;" vertex="1" parent="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-16"> <mxGeometry x="1" width="20" height="20" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-27" y="7" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-18" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1" source="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-2" target="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-14"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-190" y="380" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-140" y="330" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-19" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1" source="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-2" target="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-16"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-190" y="380" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-140" y="330" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-20" value="O banco de dados postgres gerencia todas as informações do sistema fora os arquivos multimedia." style="shape=note;size=20;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1"> <mxGeometry x="-190" y="300" width="130" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-24" value="Camada de apresentação" style="shape=umlFrame;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;pointerEvents=0;width=100;height=50;" vertex="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1"> <mxGeometry x="-830" y="550" width="625" height="260" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-25" value="<div>Dashboard</div><div><br></div>" style="html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;" vertex="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1"> <mxGeometry x="-570" y="640" width="180" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-26" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1" source="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-25" target="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-2"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-190" y="550" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-140" y="500" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-27" value="A Dashboard e uma camada de gerenciamento formulada para que o usuário do sistema tenha facilidade para gerenciar seus conteúdos, como coleções, entradas, arquivos multimídia, usuários e permissões customizadas." style="shape=note;size=20;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1"> <mxGeometry x="-800" y="620" width="175" height="150" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-28" value="Website do usuario" style="html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;" vertex="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1"> <mxGeometry x="-140" y="600" width="110" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-29" value="Biblioteca de acesso" style="shape=folder;fontStyle=1;spacingTop=10;tabWidth=40;tabHeight=14;tabPosition=left;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;" vertex="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1"> <mxGeometry x="-315" y="580" width="70" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-30" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0;entryY=0;entryDx=70;entryDy=32;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1" source="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-28" target="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-29"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-205" y="540" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-155" y="490" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-31" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0;exitY=0;exitDx=20;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;entryX=0.75;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1" source="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-29" target="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-2"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-190" y="550" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-140" y="500" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-32" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1" source="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-28" target="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-2"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-190" y="550" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-140" y="500" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-33" value="A biblioteca de acesso e uma abstração para acesso a API." style="shape=note;size=20;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1"> <mxGeometry x="-330" y="660" width="100" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="z-550T12JMX81sBNbAc1-34" value="O website do usuário pode acessar a API diretamente ou utilizar a biblioteca de acesso." style="shape=note;size=20;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="SRnkgH1l9RQqWTdyh_mC-1"> <mxGeometry x="-180" y="680" width="170" height="140" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
